::Zardus/Oblitertron::

Zardus nods, looking from Starscream to Lavatron.

"Very well," he says to the gestalt, "Contact me periodically to let 
me know your progress on capturing Megatron. The location of the 
Alliance base may change, I'll contact you if it does."

With that, he turns around, flying off toward the Alliance base, 
motioning the rest of the Alliance members to follow. Oblitertron 
takes a last look at Lavatron before turning around and heading off 
after Zardus.

"I captured a femm back there, Zardus," Oblitertron says to the 
Alliance commander as he catches up to him, "She's in the CR 
chambers, in stasis lock."

Zardus nods. "Excellent," he says, speeding up.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She rested her head on her knees and cried.  She hugged herself 
while 
> sitting in the corner.  She wondered why she even gave a care about 
> Striker.  But she knew that he was gone forever.  She remembered 
> talking to Prebon and giving herself up for Striker's release 
without 
> a chip.  She then felt a surge as the chip on her straightened out 
> her programs again.  She stopped crying and wiped her face with her 
> hands.  She slowly got up to her feet and walked over the door way 
> and watched Prebon and Slayer. She smiled and knew that is was now 
> her place to serve Prebon and to make him happy.
> 
> She walked down and went to Prebon.  She smiled and nodded to 
Slayer.
> "Is there anything that I can do to help Master Prebon?"
